title: Finally getting the hang of Azir!
body: Might bring my Azir-game to ranked in another 98274 years! Definitely one of the harder champions to learn.

replies.body: Well he had a ton of bug fixes this patch, that's prob why you couldn't get a hang of him before.

No harder than Orianna.

And I laugh at anyone who says Orianna is hard.

Im glad he is appreciated now, Azir is my most played champ in ranked (although i did start ranked late this year due to the cbf syndrome) and lots of people say 
"wtf dude pick a real champ" but they don't know how strong he is and how fun he is to play, and often eat their words afterwards 
so i wish you luck! :)
